description.title: New Password Rules
description.details: New login passwords must pass OWASP strength tests. [Passwords <= 9 char] not allowed. [Passwords >= 10 && < 20 char] - must have lowercase & uppercase & special characters. [Passwords >= 20 char] - no extra rules.

description.title: Lower Component Limit
description.details: The maximum component limit has been lowered from 250 components to 75. This restriction applies to the total number of peers + orderers + CAs on 1 console.

description.title: Fix MSP Role Builder
description.details: Fixes the 'MSPRole' field building inside a chaincode definition 'validationParameter' field when a value other than 'MEMBER' is set.

description.title: Fix Endorsement Policy Builder
description.details: Fixes the 'endorsementPolicy' field building inside a chaincode definition 'StaticCollectionConfig' field when an endorsement policy was not set.

description.title: Prep work for OSNAdmin
description.details: Partial code for the OSN admin endpoint has been added, nothing related to osnadmin is useable.

description.title: Added read-only-mode
description.details: Added a new setting that can be used to put the console in a read-only-mode.

description.title: Default password
description.details: Added a setting to allow users to keep the default password.

description.title: Fix max component limit
description.details: The max component limit was counting incorrectly.

description.title: Fixed import bug
description.details: Fixed bug that was preventing component importing.

description.title: Fixed component tile bug
description.details: Fixed issue where new component tiles would temporarily disappear until browser refresh.

description.title: Bug fixes
description.details: Updated Certificate Authority (CA) patch to 1.5.2-1, Peer and ordering node patch to 1.4.12-3, 2.2.4-2. Miscellaneous bug fixes and security patches.

description.title: Initial release
description.details: Initial release for IBM Support for Hyperledger Fabric 1.0.0.
